$MSFT Any sign of positive news and Microsoft will skyrocket!

$MSFT As long as the 1/25 low remains intact, the instrument remains in the sideways zone.  We don’t like to trade the sideways area, only like to trade the extreme areas in 3, 7 or 11 swing. #Elliottwave #Trading #Stocks

@beigea48 @akaRalphPine Ultimately their underlying business model is to use hardware as a loss leader to get as many units as possible installed, then overtime pump up the software sales by cross selling different  modules. Fundamentally it’s a real estate OS play, was before, always has been only covid, macro environment, supply chain issues etc have slowed down growth a bit requiring a different lens and investment horizon. Of course this current environment is going to slow down their growth and increase costs so the SP drop is justified to some extent, but it’s overblown IMO considering the potential upside here long term. Eventually software sales will reign king. Let it go to $2 so I can average down i’m in this baby for the long haul alongside $pltr - Big Data OS. Companies with superior OS for the new world will win out just like $AAPL & $MSFT

$MSFT - see what I mean? Fake rally. Last ten minutes was a drop. Fed QE strikes again

$AMD, $FB , $MSFT ,  NVDA , all  have been slowly bouncing back on low creeping volume with overall low momentum in truth across the board. Price action has been slow and creeping with the slow and creeping markets gradual up trend and some such as $FB & $PYPL, $ZM  could be positioning for strong lift in short cover runs  in further up markets . $ZM bounced strong off its 52 week low level today recovering $6.5 points in the short cover rebound today, while $FB, $MSFT , $AMD lagged in recovery with lower momentum.  But at least markets are showing a sign a life, lets hope the heart beat stays strong and continues to beat on.
